concept.title: セキュリティ
concept.shortdesc: Couchbase Server 3.0は、アプリケーションや管理者向けに安全なネットワーク経由のデータアクセスをサポートしています。

conbody.p: Security is very important for big data applications, which process a large amount of unstructured data coming in big volumes and at high speed.
Couchbase Server provides security features associated with administrative access and client access via Secure Socket Layer (SSL).
